title: Preorder iPhone 6s And iPhone 6s Plus At ATT.com On Saturday
text: Preorder iPhone 6s And iPhone 6s Plus At ATT.com On Saturday   Published on 2015-09-11 07:03:07 Preorder iPhone 6s And iPhone 6s Plus At ATT.com On Saturday -- DALLAS, Sept.   AT&T Inc. AT&T Inc. <-  <- stripped tags -> DALLAS , Sept.   Here's everything you need to know about why to get iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus from AT&T* and how to get one as soon as possible. iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus bring a powerful new dimension to iPhone's revolutionary Multi-Touch interface with 3D Touch, which senses how deeply you press the display, letting you do all kinds of essential things more quickly and simply. The new iPhones introduce Live Photos, which bring still images to life, transforming instants frozen in time into unforgettable living memories. Live Photos, 3D Touch, 12-megapixel iSight camera, 5-megapixel FaceTime HD camera with Retina Flash and more are powered by the Apple-designed A9 chip, the most advanced chip ever in a smartphone, delivering faster performance and great battery life. iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus are designed from the strongest glass on any smartphone and 7000 series aluminum the same alloy used in the aerospace industry, in gorgeous metallic finishes that now include rose gold. Why AT&T You don't want the most advanced iPhones ever on yesterday's network. Get iPhone from AT&T and enjoy it on the network with the nation's strongest 4G LTE signal: Current or new DIRECTV or AT&T U-verse customers who switch to AT&T wireless service can take advantage of a new promotion of $500 credit per line when they buy iPhone on AT&T Next and trade-in an eligible smartphone on each line they switch. Other customers can get $300 credit per line. 1 AT&T customers can get one of our new promotional Mobile Share Value plans , including getting 15GB for the price of 10. That's 50 percent more data on our most popular plan for the same price. Customers on these new 15GB or higher plans also get unlimited calling to Mexico and Canada . 2 Anyone shopping for DIRECTV and iPhone should also know about All-in-One. For the first time, customers can connect four TV receivers including HD service and a total home DVR, plus voice and unlimited text for four smartphones, with 15GB of shareable wireless data, on one combined bill. 3 Most AT&T smartphone customers choose AT&T Next , our device financing plan that gets you the best monthly rate on Mobile Share Value plans, and lets you pay for the device in low monthly installments. With AT&T Next you own your phone instead of lease it. AT&T customers on Mobile Share Value plans automatically get Rollover Data, so unused plan data rolls over for one month. 4 Customers can also get a great deal on iPad mini 2 16GB. Any customer who purchases iPhone on AT&T Next can get iPad mini 2 for $99.99 on a 2-year agreement when they activate service on both devices. 5 How to Get iPhone from AT&T Customers can either preorder the new iPhones at www.att.com on Saturday, Sept. 12 or visit an AT&T store or authorized retailer on Friday, Sept. 25 . Preorders start Sept. 12 at 3:01 a.m. EDT / 12:01 a.m. PDT . Customers can go to att.com/iphone to order. To make sure you can go back to sleep as soon as possible, be sure to check your upgrade eligibility on the myAT&T app or www.att.com/myatt before Saturday morning. AT&T stores will open at 8 a.m. in their local time zones on Sept. 25 , the first day of retail sales. Customers have three options to pay for their iPhone: through AT&T Next, a 2-year agreement or at full price. Customers who choose AT&T Next save up to $25 a month on access charges for each smartphone on our Mobile Share Value plans. 6 AT&T Next 7 monthly pricing for iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus will be: AT&T Next 12 AT&T Next with down payment iPhone 6s 16GB $23.75 ($285) 1 $500 & $300 Credit Offers: Limited time offers. Select locations. Each $500 or $300 in credits req's a port-in, an AT&T Next purchase w/elig svc & a elig. trade-in. Get $300 (DIRECTV/U-verse TV customers) or $100 switcher bill credit(w/in 90 days) + $200 trade-in credit/may be promo card. Activation fee $15 /line & other fees, charges, & restr's apply. See store or att.com/summerbuyback for $300 credit details & att.com/bundleofsavings for $500 credit details. 2 Limited time offers. Must sign-up for these plans to take advantage. Calling from the U.S., Puerto Rico , & U.S. Virgin Islands to Mexico & Canada included on new promo plans 15GB and up. Pay-per-use rates apply to calls made to other countries. Monthly, overage & other charges, fees & restr's apply. Subject to change. See att.com/mobilesharevalue for promo plan details. 3 *All-in-One $200 Offer: Price for DIRECTV SELECT All Included TV package and Mobile Share Value 15GB wireless service plan with 4 smartphone lines. Includes Advanced Receiver Service Fee and lease of Whole Home DVR and up to 3 add'l receivers. After 12 mos, then prevailing rate for TV package applies (currently $85 /mo) unless cancelled or changed by customer before the end of the promotional period. Non-activation charge of $150 per receiver may apply. Taxes not included. Programming, pricing, terms and conditions subject to change at any time. Mobile Share Value 15GB plan: $100/mo. plan charge for 15GB of data & $15 /mo. access charge per smartphone on no annual svc agmt (AT&T Next, BYOD, full price or month-to-month). Excludes phones on 2-yr agmts. Data overage charges ( $15 /1GB) apply. Phone purchase costs add'l. Gen. Wireless Svc Terms: Subject to Wireless Customer Agmt. Activ./upgrade & other fees and a deposit may apply per line. Other Monthly Charges/Line: include taxes & federal/state universal svc charges, Reg. Cost Recovery Charge (up to $1.25 ), gross receipts surcharge, Admin. Fee & other gov't assessments which are not gov't req'd charges. Coverage & svc not avail. everywhere. Visit att.com/mobilesharevalue for details. 4 Rollover Data expires after one month or with any plan change & is used after monthly plan data. Add'l restr's apply. Visit att.com/rolloverdata for details. 5 Limited time offer. Activation/upgrade fees (up to $60 ), early termination fee (up to $150 ), and other charges & restr's apply. See store for bundle details. 6 Up to $25 Savings: Compares the Mobile Share Value plan discounted access for smartphone line on AT&T Next to one on a new 2-year agreement. Savings will be $15 or $25 based on your plans. If upgrade to a smartphone on a 2-year agreement you will lose the discount for that line. See att.com/mobilesharevalue for savings details. 7 AT&T Next: 0% APR installment agreement & elig svc req'd. AT&T Next 12 req's 20 installment agmt, AT&T Next 18 req's 24 installment agmt, and AT&T Next 24 req's 30 installment agmt. These options require well-qual. credit. AT&T Next with down payment req's 30% down payment and 28 installment agmt. Tax due at sale. If svc is cancelled, device balance is due. Deposit & activation/upgrade fee (up to $15 ) may be req'd. Other fees, charges & restr's apply.
